# 证券行业互联网数字变革与发展白皮书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhengquan-xingye-hulianwang-shuzi-biange-yu-fazhan-baipishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhengquan-xingye-hulianwang-shuzi-biange-yu-fazhan-baipishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhengquan-xingye-hulianwang-shuzi-biange-yu-fazhan-baipishu
zhengquan-xingye-hulianwang-shuzi-biange-yu-fazhan-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhengquan-xingye-hulianwang-shuzi-biange-yu-fazhan-baipishu
zhengquan-xingye-hulianwang-shuzi-biange-yu-fazhan-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
